archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Administer Organizations Catalog
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process manages the description of the organizational structure of the CSP or field service partners.

properties.value: A CSP may have their own employees who fulfill all assurance and fulfillment jobs. The company may also delegate some of its work (or all of its work) to third-party companies that are called other parties. Both the CSP company and other parties are called organizations. â€¢{T}Establishing and managing an organization list, containing organizational chart, covered serving areas, etc.
